text:
Marina Abramović (,; born November 30, 1946) is a Yugoslav-born Serbian-American performance artist and art filmmaker. Her work are about body art, endurance art and feminist art, the relationship between performer and audience. Her career began in the 1970s. Abramović calls herself the "grandmother of performance art".
Abramović was born in Belgrade, Serbia. She was known for having a relationship with artist Ulay. She lives in New York City.
